_sText:
Hello! This is updated version of my map called de_pakkassauna. I wasn't fully satisfied with older version so I decide to make an improved one.
Some changes and features:

-HDR Lighting effect

-3D Skybox

-Improved cliffs

-New Layout focusing on better gameplay; corridors are bigger to help moving and prevent getting stuck. Less annoying ladders ;) . Terrorists have 2 new routes (basement tunnel and cottage side route). All these changes are made to improve team balance and making games more action-filled and less camping-skilled.

-Only one bombsite (it says there are A and B but they are next to each other in showerroom and sauna).

-Custom textures, custom models, more realistic details, environment sounds, working radio...

-Improved lightning

Server owners! If you are using older version of de_pakkassauna please replace older with this newer version, much better to play in servers I doubt.
And all others if you have downloaded older version and liked it I suggest you to give a try for this too!

Big thanks to all custom content makers TopHATTwaffle, Klickz72 and Dinus Saurus. You helped me to make this map better :) .
Enjoy or not, and remember to rate and comment!
